title: रोहिंग्या शरणार्थी की पुरानी तस्वीर अयोध्या में दिये से तेल निकालने वाली लड़की के झूठे दावे से प्रसारित
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: 20,000 litre oil used to light up 500,000 earthen lamps in Ayodhya. Total cost: 133 crores. Here a poor girl trying to collect a little oil from these diyas to take home. Look at the fear in her eyes. Is this our idea of Ram Rajya? pic.twitter.com/5ysbGDTjwS
